```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("macleish")
library(tidyverse)
library(macleish)
library(lubridate)
load("maple_sap.rda")
```

```{r}
# Weather data
glimpse(whately_2015)

# Selecting important parts of weather data
weather_info <- whately_2015 %>%
  select(when, temperature, pressure)

glimpse(weather_info)

# Changine the date format of the weather_info dataset 
weather_info2 <- whately_2015 %>%
mutate(date2 = as_date(when)) 
View(weather_info2)
```

```{r}
# Joining pressure and tempature from weather data with maple sap data
 maple_sap_select <- maple_sap %>% 
  select(when, sap) 
  View(maple_sap_select)

weather_info_select <- weather_info2 %>%
  select(date2, temperature, pressure) %>%
  rename(when = date2) 
View(weather_info_select)

full_dataset <- full_join(maple_sap_select, weather_info_select) %>%
View(full_dataset)


  
  


```
